pkgmetadata.longdescription: Dynamic Nomograms for Linear, Generalized Linear and Proportional Hazard Models // Demonstrate the results of a statistical model object as a dynamic nomogram in an 'RStudio' panel or web browser. DynNom supports a variety of model objects; 'lm', 'glm', 'coxph' and also 'Ols', 'Glm', 'lrm', 'cph' models.
